requiresRestart: ※ This setting requires restarting the app to apply.
uneditable: ※ This setting cannot be modified in the current version.
copyright:
DJMAX RESPECT V(©NEOWIZ), PLATiNA :: LAB(©HIGH-END Games).
We deeply respect you. <3
RACLA is dedicated to your remarkable games and services.

hardwareAcceleration.name: Enable Hardware Acceleration
hardwareAcceleration.description: Hardware acceleration uses the GPU to make the RACLA desktop app run more smoothly. If you experience issues with the app display, try disabling this setting. Changing this setting will restart the app.

autoCaptureIntervalTime.name: Auto Capture Interval
autoCaptureIntervalTime.description: Set the interval for auto capture mode.

autoCaptureProcessIntervalTime.name: Auto Capture Processing Interval
autoCaptureProcessIntervalTime.description: Set the interval for auto capture processing mode.

language.name: Language
language.description: Set the program language. All languages except Korean have been translated using Claude Sonnet 3.7. If you would like to contribute to translations, please submit an issue or pull request to the distribution repository.

font.name: Font
font.description: Set the program font. Some items may change font depending on the language setting.

autoCaptureApi.name: Auto Capture API
autoCaptureApi.description: Set the API to use in auto capture mode.

visibleBga.name: Show BGA Video
visibleBga.description: Display the BGA video when hovering over a song image (jacket) that has a BGA.

visibleAnimation.name: Animation Effects
visibleAnimation.description: Enable/disable all animation effects in the program.

captureOnlyFocused.name: Capture Only When Window is Focused
captureOnlyFocused.description: Only capture when the window is focused.

autoRemoveBlackPixel.name: Auto Remove Black and White Margins
autoRemoveBlackPixel.description: Remove black and white images in auto capture mode.

removeBlackPixelPx.name: Margin Removal Size
removeBlackPixelPx.description: Manually set the size for removing black and white margins.

saveImageWhenCapture.name: Save Image When Capturing
saveImageWhenCapture.description: Save images captured in manual or auto capture mode.

saveImageBlurMode.name: Profile Exclusion Blur Effect
saveImageBlurMode.description: Set the blur effect to apply to images where profiles are excluded.

autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrResultRegion.name: Auto Recognition Area - DJMAX RESPECT V Freestyle Results
autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrResultRegion.description: Enable/disable OCR scanning of DJMAX RESPECT V freestyle results area in auto capture mode.

autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrOpen2Region.name: Auto Recognition Area - DJMAX RESPECT V Open Match (2 Players)
autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrOpen2Region.description: Enable/disable OCR scanning of DJMAX RESPECT V open match (2 players) results area in auto capture mode.

autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrOpen3Region.name: Auto Recognition Area - DJMAX RESPECT V Open Match (1 or 3+ Players)
autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrOpen3Region.description: Enable/disable OCR scanning of DJMAX RESPECT V open match (1 or 3+ players) results area in auto capture mode.

autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrVersusRegion.name: Auto Recognition Area - DJMAX RESPECT V Ladder/Versus Match
autoCaptureDjmaxRespectVOcrVersusRegion.description: Enable/disable OCR scanning of DJMAX RESPECT V ladder/versus match results area in auto capture mode.

autoCapturePlatinaLabOcrResultRegion.name: Auto Recognition Area - PLATiNA :: LAB Single Play Results
autoCapturePlatinaLabOcrResultRegion.description: Enable/disable OCR scanning of PLATiNA :: LAB single play results area in auto capture mode.

autoStartGame.name: Auto Launch Game
autoStartGame.description: Automatically launch the selected game when starting the RACLA desktop app.

autoStartGameDjmaxRespectV.name: Auto Launch DJMAX RESPECT V
autoStartGameDjmaxRespectV.description: Automatically launch DJMAX RESPECT V when starting the RACLA desktop app. This feature only works with the Steam version of DJMAX RESPECT V.

autoStartGamePlatinaLab.name: Auto Launch PLATiNA :: LAB
autoStartGamePlatinaLab.description: Automatically launch PLATiNA :: LAB when starting the RACLA desktop app. This feature only works with the Steam version of DJMAX RESPECT V.

isNotificationSound.name: Notification Sound for Achievement Recording
isNotificationSound.description: Enable/disable notification sound when recording achievements.

autoDeleteCapturedImages.name: Auto Delete Captured Images
autoDeleteCapturedImages.description: Automatically delete captured images after the specified period. Set to 0 to disable auto deletion.

autoCaptureDelayTime.name: Capture Delay Time
autoCaptureDelayTime.description: Some games may include animations before displaying results. In this case, another capture attempt may be made for accurate verification. Set the waiting time for this.

showGameDjmaxRespectV.name: Show DJMAX RESPECT V
showGameDjmaxRespectV.description: Display DJMAX RESPECT V game in the icon sidebar.

showGamePlatinaLab.name: Show PLATiNA :: LAB
showGamePlatinaLab.description: Display PLATiNA :: LAB game in the icon sidebar.

log.clearAllLogsSuccess: All log files have been deleted.
log.clearAllLogsError: An error occurred while deleting log files.

accountInfo.name: Account Information
accountInfo.playerWarning: The information shown here includes the account ID (playerNo) and account token (playerToken) used for login data in RACLA. Please be careful not to expose your account ID and account token to others.
accountInfo.vArchiveWarning: The information shown here includes the account ID (userNo) and account token used for login data in V-ARCHIVE. Please be careful not to expose your account ID and account token to others.
accountInfo.discordWarning: The information shown here includes the user ID (UID) used for login data in Discord. Please be careful not to expose your user ID to others.

vArchive.NotLinked: Your V-ARCHIVE login is not linked. To use DJMAX RESPECT V service, please click the link button and attach the login data (account.txt) created by the V-ARCHIVE official client.
vArchive.NotFound: V-ARCHIVE account linking failed. The account information does not exist in V-ARCHIVE.
vArchive.Already: V-ARCHIVE account linking failed. This account is already linked.
vArchive.Unknown: V-ARCHIVE account linking failed. An unknown error occurred.
vArchive.Invalid: Invalid user information. Please select the login data (account.txt) file created by the V-ARCHIVE official client.

discord.NotLinked: Your Discord login is not linked. After linking, you can use Discord login and the HARD-ARCHIVE features that will be updated additionally.
discord.NotFound: Discord account linking failed. The account information does not exist in Discord.
discord.Already: Discord account linking failed. This account is already linked.
discord.Unknown: Discord account linking failed. An unknown error occurred.
